name: Grass background kit
description: A little 2d game background creation kit for you including fully parallaxing layers which tile on both left and right sides so you can produce infinitely scrolling levels. The pack also includes and example image which can also tile on the left and right if you don't want to take the time to set up layers bit by bit, The included pngs make a screen roughly 2048 pixels in height but you can always re export pngs from the included vector file to make any size background you need, both larger and smaller
